channel.title: Comments on: Converting a .Net Console Project to an Azure Worker Role Project
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Phil
item.dc:creator: Phil
item.description:
Now what? My program has the role entry point, but it can't find any local storage by name that I configured to my role:
LocalResource localResource = RoleEnvironment.GetLocalResource("LocalLogFiles");
I have published this WebJob to Azure, but I get an exception when calling GetLocalResourse. Can this even be run locally? I realize this is temporary storage, but that's all I want for troubleshooting.
excerpt from ServiceDefinition.csdef...
item.content:encoded:
Now what? My program has the role entry point, but it can’t find any local storage by name that I configured to my role:

LocalResource localResource = RoleEnvironment.GetLocalResource(“LocalLogFiles”);

I have published this WebJob to Azure, but I get an exception when calling GetLocalResourse. Can this even be run locally?
I realize this is temporary storage, but that’s all I want for troubleshooting.

excerpt from ServiceDefinition.csdef…
